mapper.select:
select ta.*,tb.resource_mark,tb.resource_name from platform_index_config ta left join platform_resource tb on ta.resource_id = tb.id
and ta.resource_id is not null
and ta.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and ta.role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
order by ta.config_order
